node.title: 'Rare and unique' sights as photographers capture big weather events
node.alt: The green lights of aurora australis over a building in Antarctica.
node.description: Photographers braveÂ all conditions to capture thunderstorms, dust devil and auroras for next year's Bureau of Meteorology calendar.
node.content:
["Some of Australia's most spectacular weather photos feature in next year's Bureau of Meteorology calendar.", "", "
Coral Stanley-Joblin captured dust devil near Whim Creek.(Supplied: Coral Stanley-Joblin)
", "Each year the agency selects 13 weather-theme\u00a0images for its calendar, and this year's\u00a0top picks were selected from 1,400 entries.", "The cover photo is an image of a dust devil captured near Whim Creek in Western Australia's Pilbara region by photographer Coral Stanley-Joblin.", "In a year of big weather events, photographers captured\u00a0a downburst from the air taken in Normanton, Queensland, a\u00a0powerful lightning strike near Forster, New South Wales and a salt dust storm at Kati Thanda (Lake Eyre) in South Australia.", "Other images include a massive swell, stunning cloud formations in Queensland and rime ice in alpine Victoria.", "", "
Lightning strike near Forster, New South Wales by Cliff Gralton.\u00a0(Supplied:\u00a0Cliff Gralton)
", "", "
Jason Freeman snaps rime ice on vegetation at Mt St\u00a0Phillack in\u00a0Baw\u00a0Baw\u00a0National Park, Victoria.(Supplied:\u00a0Jason Freeman)
", "
Patience pays off for WA photographer
", "Western Australian photographer Grahame Kelaher features in the calendar for the first time.", "", "
Grahame Kelaher captures aurora australis at Norring Lake, Wagin, Western Australia.(Supplied:\u00a0Grahame Kelaher)
", "His shot of aurora borealis over Norring Lake near Wagin takes pride of place as\u00a0January's photo.", "\"One in 10 you might get a nice shot of it, [the aurora],\" he says.", "", "
Lightning over Mt Coot-tha, Brisbane, Queensland by Chris Darbyshire.(Supplied:\u00a0Chris Darbyshire)
", "\"We went to the lake, setup and waited until about 1am ... we could see ghostly white lines in the sky and could see it bursting in colour on the camera.", "\"It's rare and unique, tough to get, so it makes it all that more special.\"", "Aurora also features in another image taken at Australia's Davis Station meteorology office in Antarctica by Barry Becker.", "", "
A salt dust storm, Kati Thanda (Lake Eyre), South Australia by Cathryn\u00a0Vasseleu.(Supplied:\u00a0Cathryn\u00a0Vasseleu)
", "
Calendar adds to weather education
", "The bureau's senior meteorologist Dean Narrmore says the calendar is\u00a0an opportunity to educate people about the diversity of weather across Australia.", "", "
Martina Nist snaps mammatus clouds at\u00a0Daylesford, Victoria.(Supplied:\u00a0Martina Nist)
", "", "
Louise Denton captures an afternoon thunderstorm at\u00a0Gunn Point, Northern Territory.(Supplied:\u00a0Louise Denton)
", "Mr Narrmore says\u00a0his favourite image from next year's calendar is a supercell thunderstorm snapped near Gympie in Queensland by Bet Wright.", "Supercell thunderstorms are strong, short-lived storms that can exist for hours.", "", "
Bet Wright's supercell thunderstorm taken at Gympie, Queensland is a favourite of Dean Narrmore.\u00a0(Supplied:\u00a0Bet Wright)
", "", "
A downburst seen on descent into Normanton, Queensland by Will Long.\u00a0(Supplied:\u00a0Will Long)
", "\"Supercells are an impressive sight, but many people don't realise just how dangerous they can be,\" he says.", "\"This one brought very strong winds, heavy rainfall and in some areas, hail up to the size of tennis balls.", "\"The rotating base you can see in the photograph is a clear indication that the storm is severe, and that potentially dangerous conditions may be on the way.\"", "", "
A large swell along the coast near Port Campbell, Victoria by Andrew Thomas.\u00a0(Supplied:\u00a0Andrew Thomas)
"]
